name: Strawberry Samurai
description:
Strawberry Samurai is a samurai-themed action platformer with a fruity twist. Slash oranges, blueberries, and more in a world filled with bloody combat, sentient fruit, and an obnoxious amount of fruit puns. 


Key features:

  • Fast combat with an emphasis on juicy gore
  • A bushel of fruity enemies to beat to a pulp
  • An interconnected world with light metroidvania elements
  • A handful of abilities to gain - aiding in both traversal and combat
  • Platforming and light puzzles
  • Japanese themed environments
  • Oh, and bathe in the juice of your enemies

Slice and dice rotten fruit, take your revenge on invading foes, and fight back against those who have wronged you, all with your trusty samurai sword. Explore flowery plains, grassy mountains, infected caves, and more, unlocking further areas and hidden secrets as your repertoire of abilities grows. Strawberry Samurai combines the quick and simple combat of Hollow Knight with the visceral blood and gore of games like Hotline Miami.

*This vertical slice was completed over the course of two semesters as a Senior CMSCI project. Your feedback is much appreciated!

*Supports keyboard and PlayStation controller

*Strawberry Samurai uses sound effect samples from Freesound.org. For a full list, visit Home | Studio Yarn (arataryan.wixsite.com)
